thread.title: Blorange Hair Is the Hottest Trend of 2017—So Far
thread.title_full: Blorange Hair Is the Hottest Trend of 2017—So Far

title: Blorange Hair Is the Hottest Trend of 2017—So Far
text: Georgia May Jagger /Instagram; Manda Wilde /Instagram 2016 brought dozens and dozens of rainbow hair trends , and 2017 doesn't seem to be any different. It's only January, and already the Internet is freaking out over blorange hair. The gorgeous color is the creation of celebrity hairstylist Alex Brownsell, co-founder of Bleach London, and her blood orange guinea pig, model Georgia May Jagger. Jagger showed off her new 'do on Instagram about four months ago, and the pretty color has picked up speed, reports Buzzfeed . You've probably figured out by now that the kind-of silly word "blorange" is a combination of blood and orange. While some have for sure colored their hair the shade of the fruit, more have gone for a washed-out orange look that resembles a peach. It looks a lot like the rose-gold hair trend that went crazy in early 2016. This new trend has a bit more red in it to give the look an orange tint. Related Hair The Exact Reason Why Your Hair Hurts Luckily, blorange hair looks great on everyone. It brightens up all skin tones, and looks just as pretty on curly hair as it does on straight hair. Here are some of our favorite versions of the trend to give you all the inspo to try the look out yourself. Loading
